author: backdraft
title: One of the greatest number of elements + 7 "Basic" Kit (Shared with 744)
review:
I think one of the best traditional "Basic" 7 + Building Set. The theme of fire engines and vehicles. Unfortunately, there is no minifig in it, but it's easy to replace. The main attraction is the "Light & Sound System." The other day I bought my own and have more than 20 years of production after all it worked perfectly. (The cost was only $ 20 with box and instructions.)

I think the development of the main fire was getting "Model Team" level, but the vehicle can not be steered. Otherwise, beautiful, not a sticker, all items are pre-printed! The 3 +2 flashing and a siren also makes the game more playable.

The colors, the total effect, the number of elements (537 pieces) allow you to create beautiful works of it.

The box shows images of more than 10 models get ideas, but the description will help in building 5 models! There's fire truck, jeep, boat, spaceship (?), etc..

If you can, do not hesitate, get one! Whether the home city can be adorned in any vehicle!

I recommend to everyone, I have maximum points!
